title: Video Game Sales Analysis — Power BI
certification: PL-300 (Power BI Data Analyst Associate) — preparation project
context: Interactive Power BI report built from a public Kaggle dataset to analyze global video game sales. The project was designed both as a portfolio case study and as hands-on preparation for the PL-300 certification, covering data modeling, DAX measures, and interactive reporting.
impact: Built a star schema model with fact and dimension tables (Date, Genre, Platform, Publisher, Game)
Created dynamic KPIs, time-based analysis, and Top N rankings using DAX
Designed interactive pages with slicers, drill-down exploration, and intelligent tooltips
Improved data readability and insights through clean UX and structured report pages
status: Personal portfolio project — interactive demo available via screenshots and video
